q2: AC Milan will be good again?
a2: Unlikely, Italian football is dominated by Juve with Napoli and Roma taking the occasional bite but none are impressing.
a3: Who do you think the best player on AC Milan is?
q4: Kaka is one of the best players in football history, and he is a legend, and when ac milan sold him to real Madrid it was a big mistake!
a4: it was also a mistake for kaka as he didnt get as much game time
